answers.answer: Haha I just finished my salad, and mini pizza and apple... And feel like I could keep going, unfortunately I didn't bring more food to work :(
Lol yes I'm exactly like that!
Ur eating very little protein that's y ur not getting full and staying that way! It's healthy to snack healthy snacks but make sure u add some protein in there mamma u will get full!
I'm just 7 weeks. But, I am absolutely a bottomless pit! No matter what I eat, protein carbs fat, anything. I am always hungry!
I am starving pretty much all the time at 7 weeks- its crazy!!! I think I might gain a million pounds lol- So far I have gained 4 and I feel like that is a lot already!!
Im 25 weeks and I get sooo hungry protein doesn't help me either. Im huuungry
Ya no matter what I eat I'm hungry! :/ I was NEVER hungry like this with my other 2 pregnancies.

Yes!  23 weeks tomorrow and I can't stop.  I eat to the point of feeling nauseated. . And i am always wanting I've cream. I am terrified about gestational diabetes. I do eat healthy but I have to have sweets every day. . In moderation of course.
I also get so hungry, but I'm only 8 weeks! I know I don't need extra calories at this point but I am always hungry nonetheless.
I just had a sandwich with eggs, turkey, cheese, mayo and ketchup on whole grain bread, and coffee, and I'm still hungry lol

question: I am ALWAYS hungry and it feels like my stomach is a bottomless pit! I try to eat very healthy tho since I'm hungry like soups, salads, fruits, veggies, cereal, and whole wheat but I'm super scared this baby will be big. I don't think my vagina can handle anything bigger than a 6lb baby since both my babies were 6lbs and with both I got lil nics like 1-3 stitches. What do u ladies think????
title: Hungry?
